select A.m_id, A.m_nick, date(A.m_regdate) as m_regdate, group_concat(D.r_type) as r_types, group_concat(C.c_number) as c_numbers, A.m_number, A.m_type from member as A inner join comments_report as B on A.m_id = B.m_id inner join comments as C on B.c_number = C.c_number inner join report_code as D on C.r_code = D.r_code where A.m_banned = 1 group by A.m_id order by A.m_number desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pagePerList}
